channel.title: Client or Server
channel.description:
Not sure where this would go either Client or Server, I think it is client,
But is there any chance for me to edit the maps of the actual runescape 317 server?
I would like to change the Character model as well, The only reason why I'm doing this is that it could help make a game without having to code up all the bullshit, I would love to learn to make a game from scratch but sadly don't got the time probabl in like 8 weeks I could start working on something from scratch.
The Idea is to change the Whole Runescape thing from Medieval to a Fantasy game.
